member.name: T:App.Metrics.Health.AppMetricsHealth
member.summary: Provides convenience methods for creating instances of and with pre-configured defaults.

member.name: M:App.Metrics.Health.AppMetricsHealth.CreateDefaultBuilder
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with pre-configured defaults.
member.remarks: The following defaults are applied to the returned : use, JSON and Plain Text health check result formatting.
